note:
Professor of Real Estate Finance, Uni. of Cambridge, Land Economy.

I research property investments in the long term and track rents, prices, and total returns for up to 500 years. Also, I apply machine learning techniques to high-dimensional “Big(ish)” data that are too complex for spreadsheets. The goal is to understand property values, household preferences, and decisions made by very human and not always rational agents.

Some #gardening too.
